item.title: Review
item.description: कृतिः नात्र प्राचीनैः क्वचिद् आनुषङ्गिकरीत्या ऽङ्गीकृतस्य प्राक्तन-प्रयोग-क्रमाधारित-परत्वस्य +आविष्करणं योगदानम्। अपि तु सूत्र-क्रम-परत्व-निवृत्ति-सहितम् शब्द-क्रमाधारित-परत्वस्य प्रतिष्ठापनम्, सूत्रस्पर्धासु च जटिल-परिभाषा-जालापेक्षा-निवृत्तिः। गण्यता This discovery (if it stands up to scrutiny as it seems to), about how a certain crucial rule is to be interpreted, overturns 2k years of tradition. This type of research would be very unlikely in traditional India - since any such researcher would be stuck within tradition - forced to parrot the same old ancient misunderstandings of scholars (who’re turned into “always-correct” sages by tradition).
